synopsis.text: Fuuko Izumo is cursed with the ability "Unluck" which causes misfortune to anyone she touches. Seeking to end her misery, she plans to commit suicide but crosses paths with Andy, an immortal man desperately seeking death. Andy realizes Fuuko's power could finally grant him mortality and kidnaps her to experiment. However, a shadowy organization that hunts special ability users starts pursuing them. Forced together, Fuuko finds purpose saving Andy from eternal suffering while Andy vows to protect Fuuko. As they evade their hunters, they uncover conspiracies about the organization and the true nature of their world. Ultimately, the duo must stand together or let the darkness swallow them and their chance for salvation. This supernatural drama pairs a star-crossed couple against forces greater than themselves. Will they find the death/romance they desire? Or does a more meaningful fate await these tortured souls?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
